attributes.action: Stop Turkey from joining the EU, remove them from NATO and sanction them
attributes.background: I would like to put forward this petition since watching the disrespect from Turkish football fans during the minute silence for Paris and now discovering that in fact Turkey are ISIS sympathisers funding and buying their oil and now today shooting down a Russian jet which is targeting terrorists.

rejection.details:
The UK Goverment and Parliament couldn't take these actions on their own. 

You could start a petition calling on the UK Government to work with other member states of the EU and NATO to make these things happen.
